mapper.sql: SELECT t.sku_numeral_value, t.client_id, t.sku_sid, t.sku_code, LPAD(t.sku_code, 8, 'A') AS lpad_sku_code, t.sku_name, t.sku_name2, t.sku_name3, t.sku_name4, t.sku_name5, t.up_down_suit, t.customer_sid, t.sku_type, t.color_standard, t.standard_color_code, t.rgb_code, t.color_series, t.picture_path, t.remark, t.disable_remark, t.STATUS, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t1.customer_code, t1.customer_name, t1.short_name, t2.nick_name AS creator_account_name, t3.nick_name AS updater_account_name, t4.nick_name AS confirmer_account_name FROM s_bas_sku t LEFT JOIN s_bas_customer t1 ON t1.customer_sid = t.customer_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON t.creator_account = t2.user_name LEFT JOIN sys_user t3 ON t.updater_account = t3.user_name LEFT JOIN sys_user t4 ON t.confirmer_account = t4.user_name
